change.item: The originals were returned to the donor in 2012. The finding aid was changed as only microfilmed records are now available.
Original encoding from Word 2000 file using Word macros and Xmetal.

did.abstract: Church formed from merger of First Congregational Church, Grandville, and Jenison Congregational Church; church records.

repository.corpname: Bentley Historical Library, University of Michigan

acqinfo.p: The record group was deposited by church through Rev. Walter M. Swann (donor no. 666) in 1939.

accruals.p: Periodic additions to the records are not expected.

accessrestrict.p: The record group is open to research.

userestrict.p: Copyright is not held by the Regents of the University of Michigan.

originalsloc.p: The originals were returned to the donor in 2012. The library has only the microfilm copy.

prefercite.p: [item], folder, box, Grandville-Jenison Congregational Church (Grandville, Mich.) records, Bentley Historical Library, University of Michigan

bioghist.p: The Grandville-Jenison Congregational Church was formed by the merger of the First Congregational Church of Grandville and the Jenison Congregational Church.

scopecontent.p: The record group includes records of the individual churches. Records of the First Congregational Church of Grandville include minutes and membership lists, 1838-1934, minutes of the Congregational Society, 1863-1891, and of the Sunday School, 1868-1885 and 1908. Records of the Jenison Congregational Church include minutes and membership records, 1903-1936. Other records include articles of association, historical notes, and miscellaneous correspondence, notices, and receipts.

did.unittitle: Sunday School minutes, membership lists, accounts
